plugin.name: Auto_Say_Visualizer
plugin.author: Nick Gammon
plugin.purpose: Colours command window if auto-say active

muclient.script:
bWasAutoSayActive = 0
function AutoSayVisualize() if GetOption("enable_auto_say") ~= bWasAutoSayActive then bWasAutoSayActive = GetOption("enable_auto_say") if bWasAutoSayActive == 1 then SetOption ("input_background_colour", ColourNameToRGB ("palegreen")) else SetOption ("input_background_colour", ColourNameToRGB ("white")) end -- if end -- if end
function OnPluginClose() SetOption ("input_background_colour", ColourNameToRGB ("white")) end
function OnPluginDisable() bWasAutoSayActive = 0 SetOption ("input_background_colour", ColourNameToRGB ("white")) end
